text.section: In this section, "Board" means the Kent County Board of License Commissioners.
There is a special theater (on-sale) beer, wine and liquor license in Kent County.

The Board may issue a special theater (on-sale) beer, wine and liquor license for use in a theater if the theater:
Is housed within a building;
Has a capacity to hold a minimum of 150 permanently installed seats; and
Regularly presents live entertainment.

Notwithstanding any other provision of this article, a holder may sell beer, wine, and liquor at retail for on-premises consumption:
For 2 hours before the entertainment begins;
During the entertainment; and
For 1 hour after the entertainment ends.
A special theater (on-sale) beer, wine and liquor license may not be transferred to a location other than the location of original issuance.
